title: Wasp attack in Moneragala: 60 hospitalized
body_lines: Sixty students, the Principal and two teachers of a school in Ethimale, Moneragala have been injured after they were stung by a swarm of wasps during the school assembly this morning, the Police said.
They said the injured have been admitted to the Divisional Hospital Ethimale and two students under critical condition were transferred to the Base Hospital Siyambalanduwa.
